lead_paragraph: Specialists in long, slippery udon noodles are rare in New York. A new one, off Union Square, makes its own.

headline.print_headline: Only the Address Is the Same
headline.main: TsuruTonTan, a Japanese Chain That Knows Its Noodles

snippet: Specialists in long, slippery udon noodles are rare in New York. A new one, off Union Square, makes its own....
abstract: Pete Wells reviews Japanese restaurant TsuruTonTan Udon Noodle Brasserie in Union Square section of Manhattan.
